ProductInfo.Features:
FREE Wide Screen LED Monitor Included In The Package.
8 Cameras: 4*1/3" SONY EXview HAD CCD II Camera. 700 TV lines, 6~22mm varifocal lens, 72pcs IR LED, 196 ft IR Distance. WDR(Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu. Vandal proof & water proof;;  4*1/3" SONY SUPER HAD CCD II Outdoor Camera, 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm Manual Zoom Lens,72 IR LEDs. OSD Menu. Low Illumination 0 Lux (with IR LED on). Metal vandal proof & water proof
8 Channel DVR with 2TB HDD: H.264 960H & D1, 960×480 & 30FPS Real time Recording+Playback, Supports HDMI & VGA Outputs. 2 USB port for data backup & mouse operation.
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control.
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support.
ProductInfo.Name: GW High End Enterprise CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor, 8 Channel DVR 2TB HDD 960H & D1 30FPS Real-Time Recording+Playback, 8 SONY CCD Cameras 700 TVL Vari-Focal Lens, iPhone Android Viewable
